headline: Solar Foods Opens First Commercial Solein Production Plant
summary: Solar Foods inaugurates its first commercial plant for producing Solein, a protein made from air and electricity.

headline: BioMason Secures Investment for Sustainable Cement Alternative
summary: BioMason receives a significant investment to scale production of its biologically-grown cement alternative for construction.

headline: Modern Synthesis Raises $4.1M to Scale Microbial Textile Platform
summary: Modern Synthesis secures funding to expand its bio-fabrication of materials using microbial processes.

headline: The Every Company Partners with Restaurant Chains for Egg White Alternative
summary: The Every Company's animal-free egg white alternative is now available in select restaurant chains, increasing accessibility.

headline: Change Foods Secures Funding for Animal-Free Dairy
summary: Change Foods received funding to scale up its precision-fermentation dairy production, aiming for commercial launch.

headline: Bolt Threads Expands Mylo Production Capacity
summary: Bolt Threads increases production capacity for Mylo, its mushroom-based leather alternative, to meet rising demand.
